mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( SUM( powerAddition ), 0 ) FROM dicComponent WHERE componentId IN ( SELECT componentId FROM componentUserUseLog WHERE userComponentId IN ( SELECT id FROM componentUser WHERE userId = #{userId} AND inUse = 1 AND componentStatus = 1 AND leftTravelNum > 0 ) AND eventType = 1 AND carId = #{carId} )

SELECT * FROM dicComponent WHERE componentId IN ( SELECT componentId FROM componentUserUseLog WHERE userComponentId IN ( SELECT id FROM componentUser WHERE userId = #{userId} AND inUse = 1 AND componentStatus = 1 AND leftTravelNum > 0 ) AND eventType = 1 AND carId = #{carId} ) order by `id`
